description: This Kotlin source file defines a DialogFragment subclass called RatingOverlayFragment, which provides a user interface overlay for post-playback content rating. It manages UI components such as poster background, PIP placeholder, title, helper text, rating buttons, and countdown timer. It also handles user interactions, accessibility features, focus navigation, and observes ViewModel state to update UI accordingly.
